mapper.select: SELECT s.`year`,p.`name`,pe.element_id,CAST(MAX(elecontent+0) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) as max,CAST(MIN(elecontent+0) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) as min,CAST(AVG( elecontent+0) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) as avg FROM section s join product p on s.product_id=p.id join product_element pe on p.id=pe.product_id where p.`name`${proScope} and s.`year`=#{year} GROUP BY pe.element_id
select s.year,s.region_id,p.`name`,COUNT(*) as 'count' from section s join product p ON s.product_id=p.id WHERE p.`name`${proScope} and s.`year`=#{year} GROUP BY p.`name`,region_id
SELECT year,sectionID,CAST(region_id AS CHAR(20)) as regionID,name,EleNum, CAST(elecontent AS DECIMAL(6,3)) as elecontent,topline from ${table} where year=#{year} and elecontent>topline
